title: Mr. Chatterbox
description: Mr Chatterbox was one of those people who simply couldn't stop talking. He used to talk to anybody and everybody about anything and everything, going on and on and on. And on and on and on.They're back! Rediscover the zaniest characters you've ever met in this best-selling series which has sold millions worldwide. Bright and charming, with easily recognizable characters and a small take-along format, 'Mr. Men' and 'Little Miss' books are easy enough for young readers, witty enough for humor-prone adults, and highly collectible for one and all.
author: Roger Hargreaves
